Description: * Various adjustments to orb spawning behavior (a bit less horizontal motion and some more variance and details to its motion)
* New categories added to builds are now wider by default
* Added a console command: deadlock_get_old_builds, which will download and print out all of the build data for your account prior to the new builds feature
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Added a directional arrow particle effect to {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball for {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Added additional particles while using {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fixed hit detection on {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch and {{PageRef|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch having 2x the range of the tooltip.
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch being able to target behind puddle
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: Fixed {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch using Guardians as a surface to punch from
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch Range reduced from 70m to 60m
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Splatter}} Splatter now deals less damage if it hits the same target multiple times. 66% damage for the second hit, 33% damage for the third hit.
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} Viscous: {{PageRef|Splatter}} Splatter Base Damage from 120 to 110
